meanings.definition: Transfer back the title to (property) to a former owner.
meanings.sent1: The house was reconveyed to its original owner after the legal process.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer reconveyed the land to the previous owner as per the agreement.
meanings.sent3: The title deed reconveyed itself magically to the first owner!
meanings.sent4: The memories reconveyed to him like a flood, overwhelming his senses.
meanings.sent5: The act of reconveying the property felt like returning a precious gift.

meanings.definition: Convey (property) back to a former owner.
meanings.sent1: She reconveyed the car to her friend who needed it more.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent reconveyed the house to the original buyer.
meanings.sent3: The cat reconveyed the toy mouse to its owner in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: The melody reconveyed a sense of nostalgia that touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The words of the song reconveyed the emotions of the singer with raw honesty.
